design_data.quote: Remove noise and present only what’s essential. Use concise copy, clear visuals, and obvious next steps to lower cognitive load and help users succeed faster.
design_data.name: Clarity
design_data.title: Make the Essential Obvious

design_data.quote: Repeat proven patterns, spacing, and naming so interactions behave predictably across the product. Consistency builds trust and reduces relearning.
design_data.name: Consistency
design_data.title: Predictability by Design

design_data.quote: Guide attention using size, weight, spacing, and contrast. Establish a clear reading order so the most important information stands out instantly.
design_data.name: Hierarchy
design_data.title: Guide Attention

design_data.quote: Acknowledge every action with states, motion, and microcopy. Good feedback confirms what happened, what’s in progress, and what the user can do next.
design_data.name: Feedback
design_data.title: Close the Loop

design_data.quote: Make interactive elements feel interactive. Provide generous hit areas, distinct affordances, and visible hover/focus states to invite confident action.
design_data.name: Affordance
design_data.title: Make Actions Actionable

design_data.quote: Design for everyone by ensuring keyboard navigation, visible focus, proper labels, and sufficient color contrast. Accessibility improves UX for all.
design_data.name: Accessibility
design_data.title: Design for Everyone

design_data.quote: Optimize perceived speed with skeletons, lazy loading, and non-blocking transitions. Performance shapes how users feel about your product.
design_data.name: Performance
design_data.title: Speed Is Part of UX

design_data.quote: Let content drive layout and structure. Prioritize user goals, keep copy purposeful, and organize information so the interface matches intent.
design_data.name: Content First
design_data.title: Let Content Shape Layout
